  3. "There's no shortcut to making great games" Embark Studios CCO responds to, and defends, AI use in Arc Raiders  Eurogamer
  4. Arc Raiders doesn't AI-generate guns from Youtube videos, Embark clarifies: "that's a research project, and not something that we're using in the game now"  Rock Paper Shotgun
  5. Embark Addresses Gen-AI Use: Arc Raiders "In No Way Uses Generative AI" Except Where It Apparently Does  TechPowerUp
